implementation.useCase: Integration of Claude into Intuit Assist for TurboTax to generate clear and accurate tax explanations for customers during federal tax reviews
implementation.problem: Customer fear and lack of confidence when filing taxes due to concerns about making mistakes and not understanding tax calculations

metrics.metric: Customer ratings on helpfulness compared to previous experiences that weren't powered by Claude
metrics.sourceText: By powering federal tax explanations with Claude, Intuit saw an increase in customer ratings on helpfulness compared to previous experiences that weren't powered by Claude.

metrics.metric: Conversion rate for successful federal tax filings
metrics.sourceText: The company also observed an increased conversion rate for successful federal tax filings—a win-win for customers and Intuit.

metrics.metric: TurboTax customers served during peak season
metrics.sourceText: • Served millions of TurboTax customers during peak season.

qualitativeBenefits.benefit: Improved customer confidence in tax filing
qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude provides simple explanations of tax calculations, helping users better understand how their tax result is calculated
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: During federal tax reviews, where customers see a summary of their return, the combined work of Intuit, Anthropic and AWS provides simple explanations of tax calculations, helping users better understand how their tax result is calculated and feel assured their taxes were completed correctly.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Close partnership with Anthropic improved the quality of explanations
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Anthropic provides exceptional support, giving us direct access to expert researchers who help us get the most out of Claude. Our close partnership has been instrumental in pushing output quality for our customers.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude was able to handle millions of customers during concentrated tax filing periods
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Notably, Claude was able to scale to meet incredible demand, serving millions of customers during peak tax season—a necessity given the concentrated nature of days when people file their taxes.

technicalDetails.architecture: Integration of Claude via Amazon Bedrock into Intuit's AI financial assistant (Intuit Assist for TurboTax), working in conjunction with Intuit's proprietary tax knowledge engine
technicalDetails.promptEngineering: Not mentioned specifically, but Intuit collaborated with Anthropic's expert researchers to optimize Claude's performance
technicalDetails.solutions: Combining Claude's natural language capabilities with Intuit's extensive tax knowledge engine that codifies more than 100,000 pages of tax code and 15,000+ tax forms
technicalDetails.scale: Served millions of TurboTax customers during peak tax season
